price: Xurumbaan ni afuufama; sun guyyaa sodaachisaati.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
